ml:doc-envelope.ml:original-txt:
ï»¿jOFFICIAL DOCUMENTS STATUTORY COMMITEE REPORT TO: The President, International Bank for Reconstruction and Development Report of the Committee under Section 4 (iii) of Article III of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Additional Loan for the Micro, Small and Medium Enterprise Development Project to the Republic of Tunisia The undersigned Committee constituted under Section 7 of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (the Bank) hereby submits its report pursuant to Section 4 (iii) of Article III of said Articles in respect of the proposal that the Bank grants to the Republic of Tunisia an additional loan in an amount of EUR 72,600,000. The purpose of said additional loan is to provide additional funds to supplement the financial assistance furnished by the Bank under the Loan Agreement (Micro, Small and Medium Enterprise Development Project), dated September 7, 2011, between the Republic of Tunisia and the Bank. 1. The Committee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to grant such an additional loan, and of the purpose to which the proceeds of the additional loan are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opinion that the project toward the financing of which the proceeds of such additional loan are to be applied continues to come within the purposes of the Bank as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said project is designed to promote the development of the productive facilities and resources of the Republic of Tunisia and is in the interest of the Republic of Tunisia and of the members of the Bank as a whole.
ï»¿Republic of Tunisia - 2 - Additional Loan for the Micro, Small and Medium Enterprise Development Project 3. Accordingly, the Committee finds that said project continues to merit financial assistance from the Bank, and hereby recommends said project for such additional assistance. COMMITTEE Senior Vice President and Group General Counsel Exdert seete yGovernor for the Republic of Tunisia egi al Vice President Midd U and North Africa Dated at Washington, D.C.
